Name: New Vandenburg Uprising
Details: The Periphery Uprising begun in 2765 when the Taurian world of New Vandenburg seceded from the Star League, followed by several other Concordat worlds. By the end of the year, the Star League Defense Force would be involved in heavy fighting in most of the Periphery trying to subdue the rebels and leaving Terra and the core Hegemony undefended against the Stephan Amaris coup, who had engineered the entire uprising to distract the SLDF.
